name: GDPR Data Export - International PII Censoring

parameters.jsCode:
// Sample EU customer data
const customers = [
  {
    customerId: "EU-001",
    fullName: "Anna Müller",
    email: "anna.mueller@email.de",
    phone: "+49 30 12345678",
    passport: "DE123456789",
    nationalId: "12345678901",
    address: "Hauptstraße 123, 10115 Berlin, Germany",
    dateOfBirth: "1985-03-15",
    ipAddress: "192.168.1.100",
    lastLogin: "2024-01-15T14:30:00Z",
    dataProcessingConsent: true,
    marketingConsent: false
  },
  {
    customerId: "EU-002",
    fullName: "Pierre Dubois",
    email: "pierre.dubois@email.fr",
    phone: "+33 1 23 45 67 89",
    passport: "FR987654321",
    nationalId: "98765432109",
    address: "123 Rue de la Paix, 75001 Paris, France",
    dateOfBirth: "1990-07-22",
    ipAddress: "192.168.1.101",
    lastLogin: "2024-01-15T16:45:00Z",
    dataProcessingConsent: true,
    marketingConsent: true
  },
  {
    customerId: "EU-003",
    fullName: "María García",
    email: "maria.garcia@email.es",
    phone: "+34 91 123 45 67",
    passport: "ES456789123",
    nationalId: "45678912345",
    address: "Calle Mayor 456, 28001 Madrid, Spain",
    dateOfBirth: "1988-11-08",
    ipAddress: "192.168.1.102",
    lastLogin: "2024-01-15T18:20:00Z",
    dataProcessingConsent: true,
    marketingConsent: false
  }
];

// Return each customer as a separate item for processing
return customers.map(customer => ({
  json: customer
}));

string.name: message
string.value: ✅ GDPR Export Ready - Customer data processed and anonymized

string.name: complianceStatus
string.value: GDPR COMPLIANT - PII properly anonymized for export

string.name: message
string.value: ⚠️ Consent Required - Customer has not consented to data processing

string.name: complianceStatus
string.value: CONSENT REQUIRED - Cannot export without explicit consent
